entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries later this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
